fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Taxation
eu_initiatives: We are currently focused on initiatives around beneficial ownership of companies and country by country reporting of multinational corporate tax information
organisation_name: The Financial Accountability and Corporate Transprency Coalition (FACT Coalition)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
Transparency International is a member of the FACT  Coalition. 
 
FACT is a member of the Global Alliance for Tax Justice. 
 
Our fiscal Sponsor is the Fund For Constitutional Government
goals__remit: The FACT Coalition is a non-partisan alliance of more than 100 state, national, and international organizations working toward a fair tax system that addresses the challenges of a global economy and promoting policies to combat the harmful impacts of corrupt financial practices.
relevant_communication: The Coalition produces reports, comments on policy proposals, produces commentary for media outlets and sponsors educational events around financial secrecy.
